sentences.en: "Brady looks like a suspect." — "I'd pull him in."
sentences.cn: “布雷迪看着像个嫌疑犯。”——“我会去把他抓起来的。”

sentences.en: Doctors suspect he may have a heart condition.
sentences.cn: 医生怀疑他可能有心脏病。

sentences.en: He never suspected anything.
sentences.cn: 他从不存疑心。

sentences.en: I suspect he's a closet fascist.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑他是秘密的法西斯分子。

sentences.en: I suspect that she is going to be transferred.
sentences.cn: 我猜想她要被调走了.

sentences.en: I suspect this book will have the widest appeal of all.
sentences.cn: 我猜想这本书会引起大家最广泛的兴趣。

sentences.en: Investigators say nearly $100,000 was wired into the suspect's bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 调查人员说有近10万美元汇入了嫌疑人的银行账户。

sentences.en: Police have arrested a suspect in a series of killings and sexual assaults in the city.
sentences.cn: 警方逮捕了该城市一系列杀人强奸案件中的一名嫌疑犯。

sentences.en: Police have issued a description of the murder suspect.
sentences.cn: 警方公布了凶杀案嫌疑犯的特征。

sentences.en: Police refused to divulge the identity of the suspect.
sentences.cn: 警方拒绝透露嫌疑犯的身份。

sentences.en: Police suspect there may be a link between the two murders.
sentences.cn: 警方怀疑那两桩凶杀案可能有关联。

sentences.en: She did not suspect that his interest was just a passing fancy.
sentences.cn: 她相信这不过是他一时兴起。

sentences.en: She has been acclaimed for the TV drama "Prime Suspect"
sentences.cn: 她凭借电视剧《头号嫌疑犯》而受到好评。

sentences.en: She strongly suspected he was lying to her.
sentences.cn: 她非常怀疑他在对她撒谎。

sentences.en: She’s not going to be very happy about this, I suspect .
sentences.cn: 我想对于此事她不会太高兴。

sentences.en: She’s not going to be very happy about this, I suspect.
sentences.cn: 我想对于此事她不会太高兴。

sentences.en: The above complaints are, I suspect, just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.cn: 我想，以上的抱怨只是冰山一角。

sentences.en: The police will see me as the prime suspect!
sentences.cn: 警方会把我当作头号嫌疑人！

sentences.en: The suspect has dark hair and green eyes.
sentences.cn: 嫌疑犯有着一头黑发和一双绿眼睛。

sentences.en: The suspect was taken to the nearest police station for questioning.
sentences.cn: 嫌疑犯被带到最近的警察局讯问。

sentences.en: The two men were convicted on the basis of some highly suspect evidence.
sentences.cn: 两名男子被定了罪，而定罪证据尚有很大疑点。

sentences.en: the two suspects for the robbery
sentences.cn: 抢劫案的两名嫌疑犯

sentences.en: The whole affair has been highly suspect.
sentences.cn: 整件事情一直都非常可疑。

sentences.en: Two suspects were arrested today in connection with the robbery.
sentences.cn: 有两名与劫案有关的嫌疑人今天被逮捕。

words.tran_cn: 暂停的；悬而不决的；可疑的；暧昧的
怀疑（suspect的过去分词和过去式）

trans.tran_en: not likely to be completely true
someone who is thought to be guilty of a crime
to think that something is probably true, especially something bad
to think that something bad has happened or is happening
